entities.description: Substances listed for the purpose of tracking use in the survey.
Drugs that fall outside common prescription drugs, including OTC (over-the-counter) and illegal substances.
A numeric code assigned to each drug mentioned.
The name of the drug as reported in the survey.
Number of times the drug was mentioned in the survey under the ‘OTHER’ category.
Percentage of mentions of the drug out of the total number of drug mentions in the survey.

relationships.description: Associates a drug with its assigned numeric code.
Indicates the number of times a drug is mentioned in survey responses.
Represents the percentage proportion of a specific drug mention out of all drug mentions.
Categorizes the drug as being outside common prescription drugs, including OTC and illegal substances.
